articles.author: Philip Blenkinsop, Kate Abnett
articles.title: EU launches first phase of world's first carbon border tariff - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union launched on Sunday the first phase of the world's first system to impose CO2 emissions tariffs on imported steel, cement and other goods as it tries to stop more polluting foreign products from undermining its green transition.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Oct 1 (Reuters) - The European Union launched on Sunday the first phase of the world's first system to impose CO2 emissions tariffs on imported steel, cement and other goods as it tries to … [+2521 chars]

articles.title: 1000x More Precise: Breakthrough for Next Generation Atomic Clocks - SciTechDaily
articles.description: X-ray laser shows a possible route to substantially increased precision time measurement. An international research team has taken a decisive step toward a new generation of atomic clocks. At the European XFEL X-ray laser, the researchers have created a much …
